name: Principality of Wallachia
startIntroPart1: Vlad III, even after being captured as a prisoner by the Ottomans, his faith and perseverance never wavered! You showed your enemies your strength, faith, courage, and violence; they all ran away just by seeing your face! You showed them that there is already a lord here!
startIntroPart2: Long ago, we were ruled by traitors, but since the rise of our great Vlad III, we have won our honor and faith against our enemies!
declaringWar: You disrespected God! and disrespected me, prepare to war!
defeated: Oh no! thats is not happening! my glory! my faith! what's happened here!?
hateHello: I dont wanna talk with you.
hateNo: I said and continous saying, NO!
afterPeace: I dont wanna peace but, this war is starting became interesthing

name: Kongo
startIntroPart1: Great King Alfonso I! What you endured to attain this throne is just a demonstration of what we are capable of! Even with your brother challenging you to war, you did not back down! And with the help of the five celestial warriors, you established close ties with the great Portuguese, creating rich and prosperous trade routes for our glory! You expanded our Empire and our dreams.
startIntroPart2: With our faith in our God, we will go to triumph and glory even with many challenges to face. We will not give up on our path.
declaringWar: In Jesus name! you will fall!
attacked: You dont have mercy! I will dont have too!
defeated: You just think in gold and glory for yourself! you stupid ambicious will destroy you in one day!
introduction: Salutations brother! in the God name, us we became big friends
tradeRequest: Faith brother, you will accept my offer?
uniques: May choose [1] additional [Pantheon] beliefs when [founding] a religion

name: Jerusalem Kingdom
startIntroPart1: Even though I have leprosy, our kingdom of God will conquer its admirable peace! Even with so many enemies and heresies, our faith will never waver!
startIntroPart2: God bless Jerusalem and its followers. Do not fear before God's holy kingdom
declaringWar: My tolerance with you is over!
defeated: I accept my fate but remember, I am Jerusalem!
uniques: [+50]% [Culture] [{in all cities} {non-[in cities following our religion]}] <hidden from users>
Comment [+50% [Culture] in cities following a foreign religion]

name: Lusitanians
startIntroPart1: Oh Great Leader Viriathus! with your glorious and sovereignty! you defeats the big Rome Empire with you little but glorious army starts a new day to wake all Lusitanians to us glory!
startIntroPart2: But you really can to create the Big Lusitanian Nation? you can do it? with us Army, Culture and Glory. We can conquist everything in us way!
declaringWar: You will pay for your sins!
defeated: Thats not happening! you destroyed us? what demon you are?
introduction: Lusitanians is here! hello for your nation!
hateLetsHearIt: You dont listening what i say?!

name: Brazil
startIntroPart1: After King Pedro I returned to Portugal, Pedro II took the crown at the age of 14, but political conflicts would tarnish his image, from the liberation of slaves through the Áurea Law to the Paraguayan War.
startIntroPart2: The great Emperor Dom Pedro II would bring Brazilian peace to all civilizations. Great Emperor, will you be able to maintain the great balance of this land? Will you be able to make this nation great and unified? We trust in you! Great Dom Pedro II!
declaringWar: You forced me to do it
attacked: You have commited a fool mistake!
defeated: May God grant me my last wish, peace and prosperity for Brazil...
introduction: It seems that great minds are destined to meet
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities] <when at war>

name: Mali
startIntroPart1: Majesty Mansa Musa! your earned the crown to your hands. You Mali Imperial is a big and stronger nation on North of Africa! with you gold and richness, you made this empire! God bless you!
startIntroPart2: But, you can make this nation again? you can make you the richest man of world? this is just begging!
declaringWar: This is war! prepare your mens!
defeated: You can had my gold, but never you we have us heart!
introduction: Hello strange! you nation needs Commerce?
neutralHello: Hello man, great Mansa Musa is here. Your nation need gold?
tradeRequest: Commerce make us nation more strong!
uniques: No damage penalty for wounded units <for [Mounted] units>
May buy [Great Merchant] units for [1000] [Gold] [in all cities]

name: Sumerians
attacked: I had a vision of it!
defeated: Imposible! how you? what demon you are?
introduction: Hello strange, i am Great Gilgamesh!

name: Macedonia
startIntroPart1: Great King Alexander, leader of the mighty Greek nation, you are truly blessed by the gods. In 480 BC, quarrelsome city-states such as Athens, Sparta, Thebes, found a way to join their forces, allowing Greece to defeat the mighty Persia in the 5th century BC, both on land and sea. Following their example, you lead a Greek coalition and finally struck down the Persian Empire in 331 BC. You conquered almost all the known world, and from Europe to Africa to India, you built an empire unmatched by any before it.
startIntroPart2: Megalexandros, son of Zeus, will you ride Bucephalas again, to gift the world with the brightness of the Greek culture? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
declaringWar: You warrios is so good when tell me? well we see this!
defeated: WHAT? How? Well... you are the Great now...
introduction: Hello! show me you scars and me will show my scars!
afterPeace: More scars in this world!?... More pain for people? Yes, you are right. Thanks for the peace
tradeRequest: Hey! my people need your arms!
uniques: City-State territory always counts as friendly territory

name: Portugal
declaringWar: Your are no fit to control a nation!
defeated: Portugal, you people we need to be strong! be strong! God bless Portugal...
uniques: Enables [All] units to enter ocean tiles <after discovering [Optics]>

name: Greece
declaringWar: Man, you mistakes made me do it. Prepare yourself!
attacked: As a matter of fact I too grow weary of peace.
defeated: You have somehow become my undoing! What kind of beast are you?
denounced: You'll regret this decision, fool. I swear it!
tradeRequest: My friend, does this seem reasonable to you?
uniques: City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
[-10]% Culture cost of adopting new Policies
